verbs.description: as trump vows to combat opioid crisis [V: spokane] [ARG0: father] takes fight to local lawmakers a phone call broke the silence in scott myers’ home he awoke at 3 30 in the morning to a call from paramedics they told me they were working on my daughter said myers they were scott myers spokane trump rachel myers
